channel.title: CVE Feed for impleCode -- eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for impleCode -- eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-4392|2024-08-03T17:23:10.731Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.9.43. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the implecode_save_products_meta() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save product meta data via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2021-4393|2024-08-03T17:23:10.721Z -- implecode -- ecommerce%20product%20catalog%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The eCommerce Product Catalog Plugin for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.0.17. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the save() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save manual digital orders via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
